text:
Students of Panchayat Union Primary School, Pallikuppam, staged a number of cultural programmes as part of the school’s Annual Day celebrations recently.

They staged dramas and performed a ‘Villupattu,’ apart from taking part in various competitions.

Merit certificates and prizes were distributed. M. Thirupathi, assistant elementary educational officer, Madhanur, was present. — Staff Reporter
title: Students celebrate annual day with fervour
